Description

"Mad Brother" is a heart-pounding survival horror game that follows the story of Jacob and his once-beloved toy robot, John. When John suddenly goes rogue and begins stalking and terrorizing Jacob, it's up to Jacob to use all of his cunning and resourcefulness to evade John and put an end to his mischief.

As Jacob navigates through a series of creepy and dangerous environments, he'll have to stay on high alert at all times to avoid being caught by John. Using stealth and strategy, Jacob must outmaneuver his enemies and uncover the truth behind John's sudden change in behavior.

With its intense atmosphere and pulse-pounding gameplay, "Mad Brother" is a must-play for fans of survival horror games. Can you survive the terror of Mad Brother and emerge victorious? Find out in this thrilling and terrifying adventure.
